code:
import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:8000';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});export const voucherApi={// Get voucher summary
getVoucherSummary:async voucherId=>{const response=await api.post(`/api/vouchers/${voucherId}/summary`);return response.data;},// Chat with voucher
chatWithVoucher:async(voucherId,message)=>{const response=await api.post(`/api/vouchers/${voucherId}/chat`,message);return response.data;},// Search vouchers
searchVouchers:async function(query,voucherId){let topK=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:5;const response=await api.post('/api/search',{query,voucher_id:voucherId,top_k:topK});return response.data;},// Vector search
vectorSearch:async function(query){let topK=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:5;let minScore=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:0.7;const response=await api.post('/api/vector-search',{query,top_k:topK,min_score:minScore});return response.data;},// Hybrid search
hybridSearch:async function(query){let topK=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:5;let minScore=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:0.7;const response=await api.post('/api/hybrid-search',{query,top_k:topK,min_score:minScore});return response.data;},// Health check
healthCheck:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/health');return response.data;},// Raw axios instance for direct calls
post:api.post.bind(api),get:api.get.bind(api),put:api.put.bind(api),delete:api.delete.bind(api)};export default api;
